x10.matrix.sparse

Class SparseCSR

  • x10.lang.Object
    • x10.matrix.Matrix
      • x10.matrix.sparse.SparseCSR

  • public class SparseCSR
extends Matrix
    This class defines sparse matrix compressed in row order, or CSR format. The class is used as temporary storage when SparseCSC needs to be transposed in matrix multiply.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Compress2D crdata

      • Fields inherited from class x10.matrix.Matrix

        make
        

        public static SparseCSR make(x10.lang.Int m,
             x10.lang.Int n,
             x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Int> ia,
             x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Int> ja,
             x10.array.Array<x10.lang.Double> av)
        

        Declaration: make(m:x10.lang.Int,n:x10.lang.Int,ia:x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Int]{self.rank==1},ja:x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Int]{self.rank==1},av:x10.array.Array[x10.lang.Double]{self.size==ja.size, self.rank==1}): x10.matrix.sparse.SparseCSR{self.M==m, self.N==n}.
        Create a m x n SparseCSR matrix based on CSR data format input
ia, ja, and av.
        

        Parameters:
        ia - integer array, the sizes of nonzero of each row
        ja - integer array, the surface index array of nonzero in rows
        av - double array, the actual matrix element data corresponding
             to the surface index at the same position in ja.

        operator()=
        

        public void operator()=(x10.lang.Int r,
               x10.lang.Int c,
               x10.lang.Double v)
        

        Set v at r-th row and c-th column.
The data entry (r,c) must exist in the compressed array, otherwise
the operation fails.

Modifying sparse matrix after creation is not advised

        serializeIndex
        

        public void serializeIndex(x10.lang.Int rowoff,
                  x10.lang.Int rowcnt)
        

        Serilaize index values in its storage by marking the row start index, so that
after index array is copied to destination place, the destination place
can rebuild the compressed array's offset and length.
        

        Parameters:
        rowoff - Offset of row
        rowcnt - Number of rows
        

        •

        buildIndex
        

        public x10.lang.Int buildIndex(x10.lang.Int rowoff,
                      x10.lang.Int rowcnt,
                      x10.lang.Int datcnt)
        

        Set the offset and length in index array for each compress line, after the compress data
in storage is copied from remote place.
        

        Parameters:
        rowoff - Offset of row
        rowcnt - Number of rows
        datcnt - Number of elements in storage copied from remote place
        

        Returns:
        Number of elements unclaimed

                    x10.lang.Int dstRowOffset,
                    x10.lang.Int rowcnt)

        Parameters:

        srcRowOffset - The starting columns for copy at source
        dst - The target sparse matrix

        colcnt - The number of columns for copy

        copyCols
        

        public static x10.lang.Int copyCols(SparseCSR src,
                    x10.lang.Int srcColOffset,
                    SparseCSR dst,
                    x10.lang.Int dstColOffset,
                    x10.lang.Int colcnt)
        

        Declaration: copyCols(src:x10.matrix.sparse.SparseCSR,srcColOffset:x10.lang.Int,dst:x10.matrix.sparse.SparseCSR,dstColOffset:x10.lang.Int{self==0},colcnt:x10.lang.Int): x10.lang.Int.
        Copy rows from source to target sparse matrix in CSR. The target row offset
is always 0 in sparse matrix.
        

        Parameters:
        src - The source sparse matrix in CSR
        srcColOffset - The starting column in source matrix
        dst - The target matrix in sparse CSR
        dstColOffset - The starting column in target matrix, must be 0
        colcnt - The number of columns to copy
        

        Returns:
        Number of nonzero elements copied.

        x10$matrix$sparse$SparseCSR$$x10$matrix$sparse$SparseCSR$this
        

        public final SparseCSR x10$matrix$sparse$SparseCSR$$x10$matrix$sparse$SparseCSR$this()
        

        Declaration: x10$matrix$sparse$SparseCSR$$x10$matrix$sparse$SparseCSR$this(): x10.matrix.sparse.SparseCSR{self==this(:x10.matrix.sparse.SparseCSR)}.
        This class defines sparse matrix compressed in row order, or CSR format.
The class is used as temporary storage when SparseCSC needs to be
transposed in matrix multiply.
